original_title: Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds at Glastonbury 2022
overview: The legendary Mancunian songwriter finally makes his solo debut, having previously only graced the main stage with his former band Oasis. With a strong back catalogue, including three number one solo albums and a few Oasis classics always thrown into the mix, fans can look forward to a show to remember as the sun sets over Worthy Farm.
title: Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds at Glastonbury 2022
